name: Christmas Family Wish List
description: Christmas shopping made simpleChristmas Family Wish List is a Notion system designed to make christmas shopping easy for all your family members.How does it work?Invite your family members or kids to create their individual wish list.Share the family access page with all your family members.Let your family members pick which gifts to buy from a pricing organized list.Let them pick which gift they'll buy to avoid duplicate purchases.What's included?Unlimited family member wish lists.Automatically
features: Invite your family members or kids to create their individual wish list.; Share the family access page with all your family members.; Let your family members pick which gifts to buy from a pricing organized list.; Let them pick which gift they'll buy to avoid duplicate purchases.; Unlimited family member wish lists.; Automatically organize wishes by price.; Extensive video setup and customization guides.; Guide for non-Notion family members so they can easily use it too.
